name: 陳殿榮
objective: 克希荷夫定律 (KCL, KVL) 及綱目電流法、節點電位法及重疊定律、載維寧定律等之電路計算技巧應用；RLC 電路之一階、二階電路之暫態自然響應及相量式之於弦波函數穩態分析。
schedule:
1. Circuits Variables and Laws 1.5 週
2. Properties of Resistive Circuits 2 週
3. Applications of Resistive Circuits 2 週
4. Energy Storage and Dynamic Circuits 2.5 週
期中考週
5. AC Circuits 3 週
6. Transient Response 2.5 週
7. Frequency Response and Filters 2.5 週
期末考週
scorePolicy:
期中考   30%
期末考   30%
小考     30%
平時考核 10%
materials:
Circuits
--Engineering concepts and analysis of linear electric circuits
by A. Bruce Carlson
